mapper.insert: insert into notification (sender, receiver, type, bno, cno) values (#{sender}, (select email from member where id = #{receiver}), #{type}, #{bno}, #{cno})
mapper.update: update notification set rdate = now() where nno = #{nno}
mapper.delete: delete from notification where sender = #{email} and receiver = #{email}
mapper.select: select count(*) from notification where receiver = #{email}

select nno, (SELECT id FROM member WHERE email = n.sender) sender, n.sender senderEmail, (select id from member where email = n.receiver) receiver, type, sdate, rdate, bno, cno from notification n where receiver = #{email} and rdate is null order by sdate desc
